text: Hey <@U8THBCFC4>! Touching base on the turnaround time for getting access to the beta drag-and-drop after requesting it for a sandbox portal? <@U3T21PDBK> was also curious about this last week. How long does it take to get approval for a portal after filling out the form?

Hey there, I’ve just ungated everyone who requested access in the second half of last week, so you should now have access to DnD conversion options <@U3T21PDBK> and <@UDFTHC6PK>. However! I think what you’re probably interested in is the new drag and drop HubL syntax? If so, that’s accessible here:

<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-tags/dnd-areas>

That’ll be available to you now even if you’re not ungated for anything new.

There’s another beta signup that <@U6W3H6YN8> is running that, when it’s ready, will give you access to raw assets in the design manager, and access to the new global content editing experience. No definitely timeline on that yet, but we’re pretty close.
